overview: 'A time only' presents the life of Chico and Mercia, two nice old people who follow a life similar to most people reaching the stage of the best age. far from the routine of some super-old people today, they lead a regulated life and appropriate technology to cheat the time and soften the feelings of solitude. what they do not know is that such a useful and current tool can either distract or bring people closer together.
title: Um Tempo Só
